com.cmput301.w19t06.theundesirablejackals.book

Class BookRequestList

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmput301.w19t06.theundesirablejackals.book.BookRequestList

  • public class BookRequestList
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for managing a list of BookRequests through searching and filtering.
    Author:
    Art Limbaga
    See Also:
    BookRequest

      • getBookRequests

        public java.util.ArrayList<BookRequest> getBookRequests(BookRequestStatus status)
        Get all book request based on BoookRequestStatus
        Parameters:
        status - status of the book that the contains
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of BookRequests which matches the status

      • getBookRequests

        public java.util.ArrayList<BookRequest> getBookRequests(User user)
        Get all the book request from this list that is tied to the user
        Parameters:
        user - can either be the owner or the borrower of the book request
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of BookRequest that is tied to the user

      • getBookRequests

        public java.util.ArrayList<BookRequest> getBookRequests(Book book)
        Get all the BookRequest that invlolves the book
        Parameters:
        book - the book that is requested
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of BookRequest which contains all the request regarding the book

      • contains

        public boolean contains(BookRequest bookRequest)
        Parameters:
        bookRequest - to be checked in the list of BookRequests
        Returns:
        false if the book is not found in the list, otherwise true.
